solution_line_template: She needs to have a total of {num_tests}*{desired_average_score}=<<{num_tests}*{desired_average_score}={total_desired_score}>>{total_desired_score} points over the four tests.
She needs {total_desired_score}-{current_total_score}=<<{total_desired_score}-{current_total_score}={score_needed_fourth_test}>>{score_needed_fourth_test} on the fourth test.
